availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Benjamin S. Newton (Franklin County, Kentucky, farmer)

body.p: Franklin County, Kentucky, farmer. Kentucky native. Married to Georgia Ann Church Newton. Father of Sarah C. Newton, William B. Newton, and James R. Newton. Married to Taletha Ann Newton in Franklin County on May 12, 1853. Father of Joseph Newton, Jasper Newton, Charles P. Newton, and John A. Newton. Farmer in Franklin County in 1850. Farmer in Franklin County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Franklin County, District 1, p. 8A.

Tenth Manuscript Census of the United States (1880), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Franklin County, Peaks Mill Precinct, p. 23.
